author: Staff Reporter
text:
A. V. Piyare John (67), Tiruvannamalai Municipal Councillor representing 31st ward died of heart attack on Monday night.

He is a first time councilor and is survived by three sons and three daughters. He has been a AIADMK member since its inception.

Attended wedding

Mr. John is said to have attended a wedding reception on Monday night.

He suddenly felt a nagging pain in his chest pain. He passed away shortly.

His son Abbas informed the press that his father died of heart attack.
title: Municipal Councillor dies
